front.title: Facsimile Applications for Internet Fax Full Mode

abstract.t: This memo explains Internet Fax Full Mode facsimile applicationswhich can be implemented using the method of capability exchange inInternet Fax Full Mode. These applications are the same asimplemented in G3FAX using T.30 protocol. These applications will beimplemented under the Internet Draft 'Extended MDN for Internet FaxFull Mode' or other capability exchange mechanism.
